import React, { useState } from 'react' import Navbar from '../../components/Navbar' import AdminPanel from '../../components/AdminPanel' import Footer from '../../components/Footer' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const AdminFabrics = () => { const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const [highestProducts, setHighestProducts] = useState([]); const [lowestProducts, setLowestProducts] = useState([]); const [aggregateData, setAggregateData] = useState([]); const [productQuantities, setProductQuantities] = useState(null); const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); return ( <>

{message}

{highestProducts.map(product => (

Highest Quantity

{product.name}

{product.quantity} meters

))} {lowestProducts.map(product => (

Lowest Quantity

{product.name}

{product.quantity} meters

))}
{aggregateData.map(data => ( ))}
Recent Activity
Fabric Date Meters
{data._id.choice} {new Date(`${data._id.month}/${data._id.day}/${data._id.year}`).toLocaleDateString("en-US", { month: "long", day: "numeric", year: "numeric" })} {data.totalQuantity}
{Object.keys(productQuantities).map(product => ( ))}
Fabric Consumed
Fabric Total Consumption
{product} {productQuantities[product]} meters
{products.map(product => ( ))}
Available Fabric
Name Meters Category Price
{product.name} {product.quantity} {product.category} KWD {product.price}
) } export default AdminFabrics
